text: Sport Club São Sebastião, commonly known as São Sebastião, is a Brazilian football club based in Porto Calvo, Alagoas state. ==History== The club was founded on April 5, 1970. They won the Campeonato Alagoano Second Level in 1996. ==Achievements== * Campeonato Alagoano Second Level: ** Winners (1): 1996 ==Stadium== Sport Club São Sebastião play their home games at Estádio José Nivaldo. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 4,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1970 Category:Football clubs in Alagoas Category:1970 establishments in Brazil
title: Sport Club São Sebastião
